nodes.text: T-4 was a moon orbiting the planet Thaere Privo in the Thaereian system of the Expansion Region.

First appearing in the Living Force adventure, Memories, T-4 is identified and described as a moon orbiting Thaere Privo. However, the adventure's supplemental web article, Trade and Trade Alike, identifies T-4 in a sidebar as, "the rather uncreatively named fourth world of the Thaereian system."
